title: Lesson 09 - One Minute French
description: In lesson 9 of One Minute French you will learn to ask people how they're feeling and to answer the question yourself. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute French at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com. One Minute French is brought to you by the Radio Lingua Network and is ©Copyright 2008.
